languages.text: Противостояние, развернувшееся между Баронессой Теней и маршалом Простора, вошло в легенды Коронуса. Тысячи людей оказались вовлечены в игру умов своих предводителей. Одни прятались — другие искали, одни убегали — вторые догоняли. Доподлинно известно, что противники, находящиеся по разные стороны баррикад, ни разу не сделали двух вещей: они так никогда и не встретились лично и ни разу не грозили близким друг друга.

The antagonism between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the stuff of legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leader's battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.
languages.original_text: Противостояние, развернувшееся между Баронессой Теней и маршалом Простора, вошло в легенды Коронуса. Тысячи людей оказались вовлечены в игру умов своих предводителей. Одни прятались — другие искали, одни убегали — вторые догоняли. Доподлинно известно, что противники, находящиеся по разные стороны баррикад, ни разу не сделали двух вещей: они так никогда и не встретились лично и ни разу не грозили близким друг друга.

traits.locale_text: The antagonism between the Shadow Baroness and the Marshal of the Expanse would become the stuff of Koronus legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leaders' battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries on opposing sides never did once: meet in person or threaten each other's nearest and dearest.

The antagonism between the Shadow Baroness and the Marshal of the Expanse would become the stuff of Koronus legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leaders' battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries on opposing sides never did once: meet in person or threaten each other's nearest and dearest.

Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.

Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.

languages.text: Die Feindschaft zwischen der Baronin der Schatten und dem Marschall der Ausdehnung wurde legendär. Tausende wurden in den geistigen Wettstreit ihrer jeweiligen Anführer verstrickt. Wo einige sich versteckten, suchten andere nach ihnen. Wo einige wegliefen, verfolgten andere sie. Bekannt ist zudem, dass die beiden Kontrahenten einander niemals persönlich trafen und nie die Liebsten des oder der anderen bedrohten.
languages.original_text: The antagonism between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the stuff of legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leader's battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.

traits.locale_text: Die Feindschaft zwischen der Baronin der Schatten und dem Marschall der Ausdehnung wurde legendär. Tausende wurden in den geistigen Wettstreit ihrer jeweiligen Anführer verstrickt. Wo einige sich versteckten, suchten andere nach ihnen. Wo einige wegliefen, verfolgten andere sie. Bekannt ist zudem, dass die beiden Kontrahenten einander niemals persönlich trafen und nie die Liebsten des oder der anderen bedrohten.

languages.text: L'antagonisme entre la baronne des ombres et le maréchal des Étendues est devenu digne des plus grandes légendes. Ceux qui se sont retrouvés mêlés à la bataille d'esprit que se livraient leurs chefs respectifs se comptent par milliers. Si certains se cachaient, d'autres les cherchaient ; si certains fuyaient, d'autres se lançaient à leur poursuite. Il est néanmoins deux choses que les adversaires se refusèrent à faire ne serait-ce qu'une fois : se rencontrer en personne, et menacer leurs proches.
languages.original_text: The antagonism between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the stuff of legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leader's battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.

traits.locale_text: L'antagonisme entre la baronne des ombres et le maréchal des Étendues est devenu digne des plus grandes légendes. Ceux qui se sont retrouvés mêlés à la bataille d'esprit que se livraient leurs chefs respectifs se comptent par milliers. Si certains se cachaient, d'autres les cherchaient ; si certains fuyaient, d'autres se lançaient à leur poursuite. Il est néanmoins deux choses que les adversaires se refusèrent à faire ne serait-ce qu'une fois : se rencontrer en personne, et menacer leurs proches.

languages.text: 阴影女爵与科罗努斯扩区元帅之间的明争暗斗，成为了无数传说的素材。成千上万人被卷入了双方的勾心斗角之中。有人潜伏在暗处，有人试图揪出他们；有人四散而逃，有人死命追捕。但所有人都清楚，这对仇家有两件事情从未做过：他们从未见过面，也从未威胁过对方的至亲至爱。
languages.original_text: The antagonism between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the stuff of legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leader's battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.

阴影女爵与科罗努斯扩区元帅之间的明争暗斗，成为了科罗努斯扩区无数传说的素材。成千上万人被卷入了双方的勾心斗角之中。有人潜伏在暗处，有人试图揪出他们；有人四散而逃，有人死命追捕。但所有人都清楚，这对仇家有两件事情从未做过：他们从未见过面，也从未威胁过对方的至亲至爱。

languages.text: El antagonismo entre la baronesa de las sombras y el Mariscal de la Extensión se convirtió en algo legendario. Miles de personas se vieron involucradas en la batalla estratégica de sus líderes. Cuando unos se escondían, los otros les buscaban; cuando unos huían, los otros les perseguían. Se sabe con certeza que hubo dos cosas que los adversarios jamás hicieron: enfrentarse en persona ni amenazar a los seres queridos de su rival.
languages.original_text: The antagonism between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the stuff of legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leader's battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.

traits.locale_text: El antagonismo entre la baronesa de las sombras y el Mariscal de la Extensión se convirtió en algo legendario. Miles de personas se vieron involucradas en la batalla estratégica de sus líderes. Cuando unos se escondían, los otros les buscaban; cuando unos huían, los otros les perseguían. Se sabe con certeza que hubo dos cosas que los adversarios jamás hicieron: enfrentarse en persona ni amenazar a los seres queridos de su rival.

languages.text: 影の男爵夫人とエクスパンスの将帥との敵対関係は伝説となった。何千もの人々がそれぞれの指導者の知恵比べに巻き込まれた。隠れる者もいれば、彼らを捜し求める者もいた。逃げる者がいれば、追う者もいた。両者が一度も決して行わなかったことが二つあると知られている。それは、直接会うことと、互いの最も親しい者を脅かすことだった。
languages.original_text: The antagonism between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the stuff of legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leader's battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.

traits.locale_text: 影の男爵夫人とエクスパンスの将帥との敵対関係は伝説となった。何千もの人々がそれぞれの指導者の知恵比べに巻き込まれた。隠れる者もいれば、彼らを捜し求める者もいた。逃げる者がいれば、追う者もいた。両者が一度も決して行わなかったことが二つあると知られている。それは、直接会うことと、互いの最も親しい者を脅かすことだった。

languages.text: Gölgelerin Baronesi ile Enginlik'in Miralayı arasındaki düşmanlık dillere destan oldu. Binlerce insan, önderlerinin akıl savaşlarının ortasında kaldı. Birileri saklanıyor, diğerleri onları arıyordu. Birileri kaçıyor, diğerleri kovalıyordu. İki hasmın bir kez bile yapmadığı iki şey vardı: Yüz yüze görüşmek veya birbirlerinin sevdiklerini tehdit etmek.
languages.original_text: The antagonism between the Baroness of Shadows and the Marshal of the Expanse became the stuff of legends. Thousands of people found themselves entangled in their respective leader's battle of wits. Where some hid, others searched for them; where some ran, others pursued them. It is known for a fact that there were two things the adversaries never did even once: meet in person or threaten one another's nearest and dearest.
